Installation¶

The most recent release is always available in the cheeseshop and can be installed using easy_install:

easy_install -U restkit

Alternatively, you can also install the development version from our Mercurial repository:

hg clone https://benoitc@bitbucket.org/benoitc/restkit/
cd restkit
sudo python setup.py install

The last command will install restkit as a package via setuptools. This will make it available in your python path. Alternatively you can copy or symlink the restkit subdirectory into your site-packages directory or anywhere in your PYTHONPATH.

Requirements¶

To use testkit you will need Python 2.5, **Python 2.6x* recommended
